header.title: The table is used to store customer's Pay In and Pay Out beneficiary details

ovdesc.p: This local table contains the beneficiary details.

desc.p: This field corresponds to the description of the beneficiary details.
This field corresponds to the T24 Customer id for which the beneficiary details are to be inputted.
This field corresponds to the Beneficiary Name for the pay in account.
This field corresponds to the customer’s account number maintained in other bank. Only numeric values can be entered.
This field corresponds to the routing number for the bank. It should be a nine digit number. This field should be a mandatory field if any value given in the beneficiary account field.
This field corresponds to the the type of Beneficiary account maintained at the other bank and also determines the credit/ debit. User can select the values from the dropdown list.
This field corresponds to the Beneficiary Name for the pay out account.
This field corresponds to the customer’s account number maintained in other bank. Only numeric values can be entered.
This field corresponds to the routing number for the bank. It should be a nine digit number. This field should be a mandatory field if any value given in the beneficiary account field.
This field corresponds to the the type of Beneficiary account maintained at the other bank and also determines the credit/ debit. User can select the values from the dropdown list.
